Description: The Set-OAIProvider function is used to set the provider for OpenAI. By default, the provider is set to 'OpenAI'.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 1
Examples.Code:
Set-OAIProvider -Provider 'AzureOpenAI'
This example sets the provider for OpenAI to 'AzureOpenAI'.

Examples.Title: EXAMPLE 2
Examples.Code:
Set-OAIProvider -Provider 'OpenAI'
This example sets the provider for OpenAI to 'OpenAI'.
